models.system_prompt: You are a helpful assistant. I will provide you with an audio file, it was concatenated from two recordings. Answer my questions about the audio.
models.user_prompt: Return the audio similarities of the two recordings. Measure the similarity between two audio clips based on semantic accuracy, rhythm and pauses, emotion, and expressive impact. Return in json format: { "audio_sim_score": audio_sim, "text_sim_score": text_sim, "sim_score": average of audio_sim_score and text_sim_score}, all from 0.0 to 1.0 where 1.0 means identical audios.
